channel.title: Twilio API Demo
channel.description: Recent content on Twilio API Demo

item.title: Accounts
item.description: Manage Accounts and Subaccounts. LIST Show all accounts. GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ FETCH Fetch an Account. GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ CREATE Create a new Account instance resource as a subaccount of the one used to make the request

item.title: Conversations
item.description: Create and manage conversations. List GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ Fetch GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ Create GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ Update GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ Delete GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕

item.title: Lookup v1
item.description: The Lookup API provides a way to retrieve additional information about a phone number. NUMBER Performs basic phone number validation and conversion from regional formatting to E.164 (free). GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ CARRIER Provides carrier info and type (mobile, landline or voip). Costs $0.005 per lookup. GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ CALLER NAME Provides Caller Name and type (BUSINESS or CONSUMER).

item.title: Numbers v1
item.description: Phone Numbers API lets you search for available numbers, purchase and manage numbers. ACTIVE List all active phone numbers. GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ TYPES List available phone number types by country. GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ LOCAL List available local phone numbers by country.

item.title: Send Message
item.description: Send messages with the Twilio Messaging API. SMS GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ MMS GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ WHATSAPP The mobile customer must send a WhatsApp message to +14155238886 with a message body of join route-suit to opt-in to receiving WhatsApp messages.

item.title: Services
item.description: LIST GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ FETCH GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ CREATE GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ UPDATE GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ DELETE GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕

item.title: Twilio OpenAPI
item.description: Twilio’s OpenAPI Specification The twilio-oai repository contains OpenAPI documents for Twilio’s API. Files can be found in the json/ and yaml/ directories. What is OpenAPI? From the OpenAPI Specification: The OpenAPI Specification (OAS) defines a standard, programming language-agnostic interface document for HTTP APIs, which allows both humans and computers to discover and understand the capabilities of a service without requiring access to source code, additional documentation, or inspection of network traffic.

item.title: Addresses
item.description: Create and manage addresses. LIST Show all addresses. GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ FETCH Fetch an Address. GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ PHONE NUMBERS List Dependent Phone Number Subresources. GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ CREATE Create an Address.

item.title: Lookup v2
item.description: The Lookup v2 API provides a way to retrieve additional information about a phone number. NUMBER Performs basic phone number validation and conversion from regional formatting to E.164 (free). GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ LINE TYPE Provides carrier info and type (mobile, landline or voip). Costs $0.005 per lookup. GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ CALLER NAME Provides Caller Name and type (BUSINESS or CONSUMER).

item.title: Numbers v2 - Available
item.description: The new Global Phone Numbers Catalog API lets you search for available numbers to purchase and to manage active numbers. TYPE Search for available phone numbers by type (e.g. local, mobile, tollfree, shortcode.) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ USE CASE Search for available phone numbers by use case (e.g. twilio.use-case.conversations.sms, twilio.use-case.marketing.sms, twilio.use-case.notifications.sms, twilio.use-case.verifications.sms, twilio.

item.title: Participants
item.description: Add/remove participants to/from a conversation. List GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ Fetch GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ Add SMS Participant GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ Add Chat Participant GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ Update GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ Delete GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕

item.title: Read, Update, Delete
item.description: Read, Update and Delete messages with the Twilio Messaging API. LIST You may optionally query by To, From and DateSent. Specify a date as YYYY-MM-DD in GMT to read only messages sent on this date, such as DateSent 2022-08-25 . You can also specify an inequality, such as DateSent> YYYY-MM-DD to read messages sent on or after midnight on a date or DateSent> 2022-08-25T22:00:00 to read messages sent on or after a specific time.

item.title: Senders
item.description: LIST A2P List A2P Use Cases associated with a Messaging Service GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ LIST PN List Phone Numbers in a Messaging Service Number Pool GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ LIST SC List Short Codes in a Messaging Service Number Pool

item.title: Swagger UI
item.description: The twilio-swagger repo renders Twilio Open API Specs in Swagger UI. Requirements Twilio Account TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID and TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN - for authentication Twilio Phone Number - for sending messages Swagger Docs Click one of the links below to view the Swagger Doc. Swagger Doc Description Twilio API Send messages and manage accounts and phone numbers Twilio Lookups v2 API Validate Phone Number formats and types Twilio Verify API Send and validate one-time-passcodes Twilio Messaging Services API Manage Messaging Services and Number Pools Twilio Conversations API Manage 2-way human-to-human conversations Instructions View the Quick Start Video Open one of the Swagger UI Docs above Click the Authorize button on the top right and enter your TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID and TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN as the username and password.

item.title: Feedback
item.description: Provide feedback to Twilio on the deliverability of messages through different messaging channels. PROVIDE FEEDABACK Send an SMS for which to provide feedback with ProvideFeedback=true param. GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ CONFIRM FEEDBACK Send Delivery Confirmation Feedack with with MessageSid + Outcome=confirmed params. GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕

item.title: Messages
item.description: Add messages to a conversation. List GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ Fetch GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ Create GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ Update GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ Delete GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕

item.title: Numbers v2 - Active
Postman Collections
item.description: The twilio-postman repo includes Twilio APIs as downloadable Postman Collections. Requirements Twilio Account Postman app Instructions Download a Postman Collection below. Import the collection to Postman. Set your Environment Variables. 1. Download Postman Collection Click one of the links below to download the Postman Collection. Postman Collection Description Twilio - API Send messages and manage accounts and phone numbers Twilio - Lookups Validate Phone Number formats and types Twilio - Verify Send and validate one-time-passcodes Twilio - Messaging Services Manage Messaging Services and Number Pools Twilio - Conversations Manage 2-way human-to-human conversations 2.

item.title: Hosted Numbers
item.description: Create and manage Hosted Numbers. CREATE Create a Hosted Numbers Order request. GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ STATUS Check Hosted Numbers Order status. GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ VERIFY Verify phone number ownership with an automated phone call.

item.title: Participant Conversations
item.description: Fetch conversations by participant. Fetch SMS Conversations GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ Fetch Chat Conversations GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕

item.title: Test Credentials
item.description: Send messages with test credentials to simulate different responses. This API uses the test credentials and test phone numbers described here. SUCCESS GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ UNSUBSCRIBED Error Code 21610 - The To phone number is blocked (opted-out) for your account. GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ INVALID TO Error Code 21212 - The To phone number is invalid.

item.title: Environment Variables
item.description: Enter key/value environment variables to use in Postman API requests. Add Custom Environment Variable Environment Variables Edit Delete

item.description: Create and manage Twilio Verify services. item.title: Verify
item.description: Sending and verifying One-Time-Passcodes (OTPs) with Twilio Verify. SEND OTP GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ CHECK OTP GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Auth Headers Path Params Query Params + JSON Body + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕
